response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you might be different. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between its true value and your perceived valuation, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a price that is favorable compared to its market value. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 12000}
